form.PN:
Kadar besedo
misread
uporabljamo v sedanjiku, jo izgovarjamo
/m*Isr*i*:d/
, kadar pa jo rabimo kot preteklik ali pretekli deležnik, jo izgovarjamo
/m*Isr*ed/
.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
misreads a situation or someone's behaviour
, nekega položaja ali vedenja nekega človeka ne razume pravilno.

seg.quote: Their behaviour was usually misread as indifference.
He was unconsciously misreading their actions.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
misreads something
, ob branju nečesa napisanega ali natisnjenega misli, da tisto govori o nečem drugem kot v resnici.

seg.quote: She had misread a date in the Tour Book.
